CustomField.formula: if( MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=1,"January", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=2,"February", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=3,"March", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=4,"April", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=5,"May", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=6,"June", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=7,"July", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=8,"August", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=9,"September", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=10,"October", If(MONTH( datevalue(Check_in__c ))=11,"November","December")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month
